price: Isheen kun daangawwan Rabbiiti. Namni Rabbiifi ergamaa Isaatiif ajajame jannattoota jala ishee laggeen yaatu keessatti hafoo ta'anii isaan seensisa.Kun milkii guddaadha.
arabic: تِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: til'ka ḥudūdu al-lahi waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu yud'khil'hu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
